name: Doki Doki Idol Star Seeker Remix
overview: Idol Star Seeker Remix is the first independent release from developer G.rev Ltd., the game differs quite a bit from the company's later games. It's a fast-paced puzzle game inspired by Minesweeper and is played on a hexagonal grid. The title was undertaken on a short development cycle and budget, but tried to compensate for these flaws through using the appeal of well-endowed anime girls in provocative poses.
